sentences.en: The superintendent swaggered into the schoolyard.
sentences.cn: 督学阔步高视地走进校园。

sentences.en: Now, as usual of late, he hung about the gate of the schoolyard instead of playing with his comrades.
sentences.cn: 现在，像往常一样，他徘徊在校园门口，而不是和他的伙伴们一起玩。

sentences.en: He moped into the schoolyard wishing she were a boy, and imagining how he would trounce her if she were.
sentences.cn: 他闷闷不乐地走进校园，希望她是个男孩，想象着如果她是个男孩，他会怎样痛打她。
